website_summaries.verdict: While these toys aren't practical for all dogs (such as large, determined chewers), they are worth considering for those who like to play with plush toys and owners who prefer not to clean up stuffing.
pros: Soft toys with squeakers that are made of faux fur and easy for dogs to grab, carry, and chew
No stuffing for dogs to tear out and make a mess
Includes 5 cute animal-like toys: raccoon, duck, fox, skunk, squirrel
cons: Not ideal for dogs that chew and play rigorously, as they can be torn apart
Dogs love the squeakers, but some have little trouble removing them, which could pose a choking or swallowing risk

customer_reviews.title: False picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toy set specifically for the loops previewed in the photo. I was going to attach these toys individually to the “tail tease dog flirt pole toy” I have for my large dog to chase. None of the toys have the loop attached to it. They are all very poor quality. I’m keeping them anyway cause my dog loves squeaker toys so they serve some purpose but don’t last. Wish it would of specified in the description whether these toys were appropriate for the flirt pole or not!
customer_reviews.author: destiny lucero

customer_reviews.title: Best pack of doomed animals ever!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a heavy chewer. No doubt about it. I bought this pack knowing full well their torn up little bodies would soon litter my house and the stuffing would fall like snow. They honestly lasted a bit longer than I expected! I think she may have just been overwhelmed trying to decide which one to kill first. I appreciate this companies attention to safety. They wrap the doomed squeakers in a chew proof sack that prevented any foreign body risk. I'll buy this lot again once the flat varmint carcasses fail to entertain my mass murderer.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. I can take them or leave them, but then I'm not a dog. The duck is stuffed (was); the rest are floppy, with squeak devices inside. We've had them for a few weeks, and they're holding up pretty well. They get tugged on, flapped around, piled up, lugged about, left outside, growled at, drooled on. So I guess that means they function as intended.
customer_reviews.author: RW Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is not a heavy chewer. She does, however, love to take stuffing out of toys. Finding a set without stuffing is important. This fit the bill. She loves them. After a couple of months she was able to get the head off the raccoon but as there's no stuffing it wasn't a big deal. The stuffed duck....hasn't been so fortunate. It lasted a short while before bursting and the dog had the stuffing. Overall for the price it is definitely worth it. Hours of fun to be had.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: He tears them up...but that's okay.
customer_reviews.text: My beagle mix pup (just turned 1) is not kind to his plush toys but he LOVES them. I love the way I don't have to pick stuffing off the floor. I've now purchased this bag of toys for the second time. He loves when I go to the closet to get a toy out of his orange bag. He loves to tear these toys apart - which is does pretty quickly - but after they are ripped up my husband can still play tug of war with him for 2-3 weeks. He continues to chew on them and play with them until I finally decided they have had enough and I go get another out of his orange bag.
customer_reviews.author: K. DiGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Hyper dog's favorite toys!
customer_reviews.text: My 25 lb shelty mix rescue dog Bailey is super hyper; these are her go-to toys when she gets riled up, she chews them, "breaks necks" and they are great to throw for fetch, squeaky but not annoying squeaky, and lasted a long time for the amount of time she plays with them, almost a year to get through the 5 toys. Plus they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: J. Knaus

customer_reviews.title: All five toys still going strong one month later!
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for our German shepherd. She LOVES them. And I love watching her walk around with them hanging out of her mouth. Part morbid (they look like road kill), part adorable (carrying around her babies). Her favorite one, the squirrel (beaver?) Has a small tear but that's it. Completely functional still. And she beats these pretty good. She is not even close to an aggressive cheer though. I dont think they would hold up long to a dog that tears through toys like it's their job. But if your dog treasures and appreciates each of their toys then buy these. They're great and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: KRocque

customer_reviews.title: NO LOOPS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these toys specifically for the loops to use on a flirt pole. These toys DO NOT have the loops that are pictured in the photos. The toys are ok, not high quality so your dog will destroy them quickly. I’m probably going to send them back. I don’t know about you but $19.98 for 5 toys that don’t have loops & will fall apart quickly doesn’t seem like a deal to me. I’m so disappointed that they are not what’s shown in the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4CH's

customer_reviews.title: my dogs loved them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely loved this set of toys and they have become their favorite from their toy collection! The two smaller toys (skunk & fox) have portions of fuzz/hair and they like those the best. The duck has crinkle noise in the wings. The two larger toys (squirrel & raccoon) have very large squeakers in the head and my dogs love the sound! Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Micah C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: 5 toys for this price is good BUT I purchased this item because the picture shows there is a loop on the end of each and none of them actually had one. I only bought them to use on the end of a flirt pole so I am disappointed. On their own they did not stand up to my dogs chewing and each only last about 3 minutes. I would not purchase again. If your dog doesn’t destroy toys quickly this might be ok.
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved them all
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr. old Lab/Border Collie mix loved each one. She destroyed each one and still played with them even after they were pretty much unrecognizable. I've now got another group on order. in fairness though, I did give them to her before she turned 3 and weighed a mere 30 lbs. She's now about 55 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: imabuyr831

customer_reviews.title: Great variety!
customer_reviews.text: Our two dogs LOVE these toys. One of our dogs is a CORGI and the other is part Corgi and part Skiperke. The Corgi knows all of the names of the toys and tries to "hoard" them from our other Furbaby. Very durable. Having 5 different critters and sizes is helping to keep them intact and not chewed to pieces! Sqeakers are all still working.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Packard

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but won't last
customer_reviews.text: I have a King Charles Caviler; he is a relatively small dog and loves to play. But for some reason he does not like the speaker inside the toys and tears them up to get the squeaker out. I bought these hoping that they would be strong as indicated and they would last. But they did not.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoying Life

customer_reviews.title: Squeakers don’t work !!
customer_reviews.text: Squeakers do not work in the racoon at all. And the squeaker in the black skunk seems as though it’s apart on the inside. It raddles like it’s broken. Doesn’t squeak at all. I have to very disappointed puppies. Maltese and a Shitzu. Will not purchase again. All the animals are cheaply made except for the duck. But it doesn’t squeak. It just has some crinkly paper noise in the wings.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs that like to chew
customer_reviews.text: These toys are very cute and soft and just the right size for any sized dog. Unfortunately when I put one out it she got the squeakers out in a few minutes and then continued to chew the rest. She is only 12 weeks old. If you have a chewer I wouldn’t recommend. If you don’t then these are adorable!
customer_reviews.author: TeslaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Many Dog Toys for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs, and 2 of them play with toys. They enjoy these because they have a squeaker and are easy to grasp and tug on with each other. I've given one away as a gift to my sister who plans to get a puppy. Her eyes lit up when she received it. They are cute and not as easily destroyed as stuffed dog toys.
customer_reviews.author: Art Lover

customer_reviews.title: The picture shows a loop at the end of the toy....there is none!!!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I bought this because the picture showed a loop at the end of the toy. I bought an outward hound tail teaser and the squeaky toy finally broke off. They no longer sell only the replacement squeaky toy. I saw these and it looked like there is a loop on the end so thought I could use it on my tail teaser. WRONG. No loop so....I will have to try and figure out a fix for it.
customer_reviews.author: TEY

customer_reviews.title: These toys may work with dogs that have no teeth.
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 2 and they were destroyed in 15 minutes. Duck was unstuffed and squeaker out while I was out of the room. Didn't take long!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Simeone

customer_reviews.title: great deal and my dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: my dogs love these. they are strong enough to play tug of war, but eventually they will tear. I have a pit bull and he loves to tug of war. so for the price I ordered these a few times a year. they do have squeekers in them. so my dog's mission is to rip out the squeeker as soon as possible. he must be annoyed by the squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Mackrel

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Having a set of toys is working out great...I rotate every few days and the used get thrown in the wash...comes out great each time from laundry....the dog always has a clean toy...all toys seem to last washing and dog chewing-squeaking, and carrying around to play.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: NO LOOP ATTACHED!!!!;
customer_reviews.text: Super upset after opening the package today. I bought these toys specifically because they had the small loop attached and could be used for a flirt pole. I don't understand why it would show the loop in the picture but arrive without one. Would have never bought these otherwise. Also seem extremely cheap quality and possibly used. I've never written a review for anything ever but this was so frustrating I had to make sure no one else will buy this if they want the loop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Toy is Stuffed
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because they say no stuffing but the duck is stuffed with poly fill which could be dangerous to your dog if they are a rip up their toy kinda dog. Unless you have a small dog, do not expect these toys to last very long. They are also made in china and quality control is not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Dobry

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to write a title
customer_reviews.text: My dog at least partially tore all of them the first day. The scraps lasted for about a month. So, they didn't last long, but she had the time of her life doing it, and that's the point, right? Maybe next time I'll portion them out, but this time was for Christmas. Also the lack of stuffing mess was great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Duck is crappy, other toys are good. Overall good value.
customer_reviews.text: The raccoon is a great toy, my puppy loves it. I like it because you can play fetch, chase, or tug of war with it easily. And it has squeakers in both ends. All the fuzzy animals seem like good bargains. However, 4 stars because the duck fell apart within the first few days - strings coming out bill and feet gnawed off in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Not Flirt Pole compatible
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could have some replacement toys for my dog's flirt pole. I mistakenly purchased these based on the images shown for the product, believing they had a string attached to the head of the toy where I could connect it to the flirt pole.. this string is not there on any of the toys. Overall the toys are fine for a dog that isn't overly rough with them, however I have had them for a day and my dog has already destroyed two of them. I rated it so low because it does not hold up to what I believe I ordered and they aren't lasting very long.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great toys i would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why most dog toys arnt made like this! This set of toys saved me from so many messes and cleanups. My dog didn’t even care that they didn’t have stuffing. I would recommend these to anyone who owns a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Birge

customer_reviews.title: all 3 dogs loved them
customer_reviews.text: 2 Shih Tzus and 1 American Eskimo .. The three dogs have played with these over and over... only one has been destroyed in several months.. they are not for aggressive or heavy chewers... but our eskimo tears through toys and she's played with the duck much longer then majority of her toys...
customer_reviews.author: coffy b.

customer_reviews.title: Very wasteful packaging
customer_reviews.text: Wasteful packaging. This item is very wasteful, the plastic bag is not marked as recyclable, that bag contains ANOTHER orange tie bag that while could be reused is so small has little use. Just wasteful
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved them
customer_reviews.text: My pup is an avid chewer so they did not last too long after I gave them to play with, but both pups loved them and I liked that there was no stuffing for my one to tear open and try to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Not made for dogs that play or pull.
customer_reviews.text: These are not made for dogs in my opinion. 1 hour after opening the duck has a hole, lost 1.5 limbs, the rabbits head was pulled off and fabric chunks of some others so I pulled them up. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Marie Allocco

customer_reviews.title: Loved them for the value not so much durability
customer_reviews.text: So my dog was able to shred these fairly quickly. They would be durable if he didn’t like to chew on them when we are not playing with them. Still cheaper to buy these at this price and not be sad when they are messed up, then spending the same amount for one at Petsmart.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T

customer_reviews.title: Good for aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60 pound black lab that is an aggressive chewer. Any new stuffed animal I give her is literally completely destroyed in 2 minutes. Even though she gets the squeaker out of these just as quickly, the rest of the toy stands up to her play quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these and great value pack
customer_reviews.text: These toys are soft and easy for dogs to tote around and chew on and they don't have all of the fluff inside to pull out. You get about six in a pack. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: depends on the breed yo
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these for my Shitzu - win. I also bought these for my daughter's Australian shepherd and Lab - fail. And for my son's Bulldog and Great Dane - Major fail.
customer_reviews.author: Angelheart750

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: These do not have the hook loops on the end of them as shown in the item picture. I wanted to use these on the end of a dog flirt pole / lure toy and in reality there is no way to connect them.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Eriksen

customer_reviews.title: Great squeaky toys!!
customer_reviews.text: Great squeaky toys. My German Shepherd pup loves them. We take them from her at night so that she doesn’t keep us up, but all throughout the day she plays with them. They are surprisingly durable too. Very happy with this purchase and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: b9sling

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice materials, excellent quality, very attractive, machine washable, very reasonable price. My German Shepherd Doberman mix was able to rip out the squeakers eventually, like she does with every toy, but they are still holding together in one piece and still look great, and I don't have to deal with stuffing all over my home. I expect they will last a long time. However the stuffed duck won't survive her chewing so I only bring it out to play fetch.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: SO durable!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog Myra (a 22 lb full grown mixed breed) usually tears up any toy i get her in a matter of minutes...lol, i love her, but she is a terror!! Not these though! Since they have no plush stuffing, there is nothing to tear up...no muss, no fuss...she has had them over a week and they are all still intact!..Bottom line, if you have an aggressive chewer, your doggie will love these toys..mine does....thanks for this great product! "woof", says Myra
customer_reviews.author: eddie mugavero

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie toys.
customer_reviews.text: My Bishon loved them, especially the brown squirrel. He chews them up and carries the squirrel with him everywhere he goes. Great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Stansel

customer_reviews.title: dont know
customer_reviews.text: got for my dog for Christmas last year but she didn't have a chance to play with them because sadly we had to put her down due to having cancer
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Mould

customer_reviews.title: Good for playing, but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. My pup definitely loved them, enough to tear them to shreds within 2 weeks. We still have some that aren't bad enough to toss, but only 1 squeaker remains among them all.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Carver

customer_reviews.title: He's quite the chewer- and loves to consume his toys bit by bit despite my best efforts to stop him
customer_reviews.text: My Dog went through each in a day because that's how I gave them to him. He's quite the chewer- and loves to consume his toys bit by bit despite my best efforts to stop him. He did enjoy these for the very short time he had them.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value but my girlie poo rips them up in 10 minuets flat. His mission is always to take out the squeakers!
customer_reviews.author: Dominick A. Donoflio

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the toys, good value for 5 medium-large toys
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved these toys. 5 fairly big toys for $20 bucks is pretty good value for me. The only issue I had was some weird powder substance that was on the skunk toy, so I just immediately trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: MikeN

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: They lasted about half a day they (my dogs) love getting to the squeaker and taking it apart. Guess they dont like the squeak. Funny. But great value. Would def buy again in future!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, I needed to return them
customer_reviews.text: These were just not as easy for my pup to get them to squeak. I think she's just too little. They DID appear to be well-made. And would probably last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dimples 22

customer_reviews.title: my Pug LOVES these...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and they arrived quickly and are great quality. My pug typically gets the squeaker out very quickly, but with these he can't. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great Toys
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these toys. I often find them all over the house after the dogs have played with them.
customer_reviews.author: Theaterdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Decent value - especially compared to other toys. The duck is the longest lasting and stays pretty clean. The others break apart somewhat quickly but they're not bad. I will be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lillie

customer_reviews.title: they basically 'feel in love " even our older dogs who didn't 'play' as ...
customer_reviews.text: wow all thew dogs got there own toy" !! they basically 'feel in love " even our older dogs who didn't 'play' as they did when they where pup's took to the toys .amazing product , A+A+A+
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT LEE JOHNSON JR

customer_reviews.title: Look funny, wont last for a hard chewer
customer_reviews.text: Our big dog had no trouble tearing these up. They look funny but won’t last - which was expected, so I’m not totally disappointed by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Top Buyer

customer_reviews.title: For the light chewers
customer_reviews.text: I have a Boston Terrier and he's a heavy chewer. These toys lasted less than a week. It was nice to not have stuffing all over my yard. But he literally tore these up in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Spoiled Rott'n

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love em and I didn’t have to clean up stuffing!
customer_reviews.text: They were a pretty good value. They lasted at least as long as the crazy expensive “durable” toys.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann Napolitano

customer_reviews.title: His Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is the only toy that if he leave outside, I can tell him to go get it, and he does. Any other toy, he doesn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect puppy/playful, dog toys....
customer_reviews.text: Love these soft, floppy, toys.....the puppy throws them in the air and manages to entice our 5 year old dachshund to play with him... Just great, little, toys....
customer_reviews.author: Missy H

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had these for over a month now with a beagle and a Doberman they still love playing and carrying them around.... surprisingly none have been ripped apart
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ward

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these toys.
customer_reviews.text: These have held up very well to my small chewing monster. He can destroy a chew toy in minutes. These are for the most part still in one piece and are some of his favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: simon loves his toys
customer_reviews.text: my dog Simon will chew just about every thing and destroy it in a few minuets. we got this set as a Christmas present (don't judge) for him and by giving them all at the same time he cant settle on one to destroy. so far he has only torn the squeakers out.
customer_reviews.author: ZombiesByte

customer_reviews.title: The dogs, they love these
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They've been enjoyed greatly by my 2 pals.
customer_reviews.author: Christian M Jean

customer_reviews.title: Dog toys
customer_reviews.text: Products arrived and as described. They didn’t hold up well to my two bullys playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: herndon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Our dog tore all of them within 2 weeks. Probably better for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves them. much cheaper than buying at petsmart.
customer_reviews.author: JASON G

customer_reviews.title: Good toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pack to give out as doggie gifts individually. Hold up nicely even for heavy chewers. Storage bag was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: My dog literally didn't know what to do with 5 new toys at the same time! He loves them and hasn't stopped squeaking since he got them.
customer_reviews.author: Tori J.

customer_reviews.title: My Skunk was MIA
customer_reviews.text: I only have a 4 because the Skunk toy that is shown was actually missing from the group of 5 but CUSTOMER SERVICE actually replaced with new.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL WILSON

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these.... we toss them around or she sits and chews them. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Dog enjoys
customer_reviews.text: My dog seemed to enjoy these toys. It is the first time we have tried this type out.
customer_reviews.author: mel_dyh

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described. My dog chewed apart the duck in minutes and it was a fluff nightmare. but the unstuffed toys worked out really well
customer_reviews.author: miss_c

customer_reviews.title: Not loop on dog toy
customer_reviews.text: Love these but they did not have loop like the picture shown. Such a bummer because I bought them for my dogs flert toy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but destructible
customer_reviews.text: Dogs likes them but could easily tear them open and get out squeaks and cotton.
customer_reviews.author: E.Relttas

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Cute, good price, but not very durable. My beagle/boxer had them torn apart within about 30 min. Good as disposable toys
customer_reviews.author: Kim S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Having a dog that can demolish a toy in the first day, these toys seem like they’ll last long . My baby girl loves these toys so I’m satisfied!(:
customer_reviews.author: Azia Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for some dogs
customer_reviews.text: these are very cute but my dogs had them shredded in seconds. not recommended for some dogs
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kackley

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves this
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for a teething 4 month old GSD pup. And the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kulaponeke

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs didn't destroy these quickly. They've become a little torn up in a few months but they're still able to play with them. They don't make much mess either.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nearly lasted half a day
customer_reviews.text: Duck was destroyed in five minutes. Then onto the fox. It lasted a bit longer, 17 minutes. Before half of the day was gone, they were all shredded.
customer_reviews.author: NLS

customer_reviews.title: Puppy approved
customer_reviews.text: My dogs new favorite toys. He snuggles with them. He is always caring one around now.
customer_reviews.author: PJHAM

customer_reviews.title: Dog toys
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these animals!!! Not stuffing all over the house!!
customer_reviews.author: William E Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Four Paws Up
customer_reviews.text: The seams aren't all that so the squeakers come out fairly easily, but the fabric is pretty durable and my dogs love these toys. Four paws up.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Doig

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure EVERY thing is in order before letting your dog play with the toys
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 5 showed up not completely sewn. One of the Squeakers didnt work. My puppy isn't even able to come home yet( only 6 weeks old). Not a real happy shopper here
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable dog toys.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them, he don't even want to share with my other dog. They look good and I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Morales

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Max loves them. I don't have to worry about stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Loved this and it even came with a little carrying bag. Will totally be buying a lot more. Good material made toys also.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my dog has extra sharp teeth
customer_reviews.text: Maybe its just my dog, but not even 10 minutes before the head was ripped completely off
customer_reviews.author: Mykull & Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: My dog like them
customer_reviews.text: One is not stuffing free. My dog had the squeakys out in the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT stuffing free, as the garbage can full of white fluff can verify.
customer_reviews.author: Dina B.

customer_reviews.title: Bark
customer_reviews.text: Bark BarkBark BarkBark BarkBark BarkBark BarkBark BarkBark BarkBark Bark BARK BARK BARK
customer_reviews.author: James Bonifant

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for light chewers
customer_reviews.text: Smaller dog loves them, but bigger strong chewer just tore them apart. Still fun for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Engle

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it. Lasting a long time. Wish the didn’t have any stuffing in some of them.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Meh. At least there were 5 of them
customer_reviews.text: The squeakers didn’t last 10 minutes with my Pomeranian. She ripped them right out. I purchased the stuffingless ones so she didn’t have fill to choke on.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Amenta

customer_reviews.title: I really liked them at first because the dogs loved them
customer_reviews.text: I really liked them at first because the dogs loved them. But within 2 weeks, they had tore them up and got the squeekers out. Not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for a great set of dog toys
customer_reviews.text: Our Pit mix LOVED these. Yes, he destroyed each one over a few days time so I'm glad they came as a value set, but we will be purchasing them again because they make him so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Wiwse

customer_reviews.title: No stuffing!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs think gutting toys is their job. With these toys no more stuffing all over the house.! Are dogs love them and so do we!
customer_reviews.author: steve nicks

customer_reviews.title: Not my best purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The unstuffed toys looked like they had already been chewed on. Ratty seams and tufts coming off. Duck was really nice thought.
customer_reviews.author: AZshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good pet toys and fast ship
customer_reviews.text: All pet toys are really nice and the3 seller had very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: My 2 fur kids loved these toys
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the actual size. I looked through the pics and comments before purchasing. I was afraid of getting little toys for 2 70 pound dogs....
customer_reviews.author: brandy simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a dog
customer_reviews.text: Came early, well made, my dog loves them, great price u can't beat,
customer_reviews.author: mary harvey

customer_reviews.title: He loved his lil fox tho! And is still kicking it been almost a year now
customer_reviews.text: One was broken before my pup could even play butt the rest held upppp
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Toys are great and love they come in a set. I have a little dauschund that "kills" his immediately and loves to get these!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Reed

customer_reviews.title: My dogs enjoyed the toys
customer_reviews.text: My large dogs loved the toys. Can't comment on longevity because they like to bury them. Pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: shalwas

product_meta.title: LEGEND SANDY Plush Animal Dog Toy Set, Value Pack 5 Squirrel Squeaky Toys Unstuffed Chew Toys with Storage Bag
product_meta.description:
Hunting is animal's nature. They will be happier by hunting, but now many pets have lost the pleasure of hunting. Because they couldn't hunt like they are in the wild.

Don't worry, our animal shaped hunting stuffingless dog toys are especially designed for dogs. When you are busy with your work, these dog toy can accompany with them. When you’re at home, you can play these toys with your pets together. When your pets and you go out for a walk, take these toys with them. Let them chase animals, relieve anxiety and regain their happiness. Make your dog's life more colorful, physical and mental healthier!

Funny animal shape and squeakers built-in can increase dog’s interest. Soft plush material won’t hurt dog’s teeth and mouth. Accompany with your dog and provide long-lasting entertainment.

Come on! Don't let your dog wait too long for this toy! We are sure your dog will definitely love these no stuffing dog toys!

This value 5 pack dog toys size : fox 16.5", raccoon 23.6", squirrel 23.6", skunk 16.5", duck 17.7". suitable for small and medium dogs, not for large dogs and aggressive chewers.

Keyword:pitbull toys、stuffless dog toy big dog toys large dog toys squeeky squeaky dog chew toys
feature_bullets: Made of simulated animal fur,value pack of 5. Include fox, raccoon, squirrel, skunk and duck
Five most popular and favorite animal shape stuffingless dog toys, meet the desire of animal hunting. Helps clean dog’s teeth and fresh breath
Built-in squeakers in each toy, which can attract dog's more attentions. Provides long-lasting entertainment, fights anxiety, depression and boredom
Convenient storage bag is included for trips to the park or concealing at home
Not for aggressive chewers. These plush squeaky dog toys are not indestructible. We recommend supervised play, and timely replacement of the broken ones
